modals.currencyDescription: This will be your default currency for new expenses and budgets.
modals.languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the app.
modals.feedbackDescription: We are a small team and we would love your input on Piggus, we really appreciate it!
modals.roadmapDescription: Exciting features coming to Piggus! Here's what we're working on:
modals.supportUsMessage: Hey there, thanks for clicking on this button, we really appreciate it. For now we don't have a structured way to get financial support to help cover the costs of the app but please share the word about Piggus, the more people join us the more chances we have to grow and build together a great product! ðŸ’ª
